    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayListener

        public PlayListener()
        Default constructor of this class. It initializes all its attributes, setting the initial position and the boolean as "false" and both times.

    • Method Detail

      • onEndFile

        protected void onEndFile()
        Method called at the end of the reproduction of a file. If there is another file next to the previously played, it plays it. Otherwise it sets the position to 0.
        Specified by:
        onEndFile in class edu.ub.prog2.utils.BasicPlayListener

      • next

        protected void next()
        Method that plays the following file, changing the position of the file that has to be played.
        Specified by:
        next in class edu.ub.prog2.utils.BasicPlayListener

      • hasNext

        protected boolean hasNext()
        Checks if there is another file left to be played.
        Specified by:
        hasNext in class edu.ub.prog2.utils.BasicPlayListener
        Returns:
        True if there is another file to be played, false otherwise.

      • startPlayback2

        public void startPlayback2(FileFolder ff,
                           boolean repCic)
        Method that calls the playMediaFile method of the PlayingMediaFile 's or the showMediaFile of the Image objects. It will be called in the next method.
        Parameters:
        ff - Folder that will be entirely played/shown.
        repCic - Boolean needed to specify if the reproduction has to be cyclic.

      • startPlayback

        public void startPlayback(FileFolder ff,
                          boolean repCic)
        Method that starts to play the folder. It just sets the position to zero, and then calls startPlayback2 with the same parameters.
        Parameters:
        ff - Folder that will be entirely played/shown.
        repCic - Boolean needed to specify if the reproduction has to be cyclic.

      • getPlaying

        public boolean getPlaying()
        Getter of the boolean attribute playing.
        Returns:
        Boolean type, returning true if playing is true, false otherwise.
